name: Greg
welcomeMessage1: Hi! I'm a full-stack developer based in Greater Montreal.
welcomeMessage2: I love creating engaging and innovative experiences for brands and their customers.
quote: Design shapes the user's journey; code ensures they reach their destination.

projectEcoleEnFolie.name: École en folie
projectEcoleEnFolie.description: A subscription-based service allowing access to a bank of French and Math exercies for elementary education.
